sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Container, Box, Typography, Button, Paper, Grid } from '@mui/material'; const data = { currentValue: '1,00,000', totalReturns: '10,000', returnsPercent: '10%', invested: '90,000', xirr: '12%', dayReturn: '0', dayReturnPercent: '0.50%', }; function App() { return ( Current Value ₹ {data.currentValue} Total Returns ↑ ₹ {data.totalReturns} ({data.returnsPercent}) Invested ₹ {data.invested} XIRR {data.xirr} 1 Day Return ₹ {data.dayReturn} ({data.dayReturnPercent}) ); } export default App;
